name: Space Station Ψ: N.E.O.N
description:
USE YOUR QUICK WITS AND SKILL TO ESCAPE THE DERELICT SPACE STATION ALIVE! An unknown catastrophe has left you the lone survivor on the space station and it’s up to you to navigate the empty hallways and use energy capsules to ensure your escape from the space station, but something lurks in the shadows and seems to be drawn towards the energy the capsules emanate. Critics say this atmospheric, edge-of-your seat adventure really makes you feel like you’re trapped in a space station with a monster.

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space- Drop Canister

Original Soundtrack

Lead Developer- Ben Thompson

Lead Level Designer- Caleb Niehues

Lead Art Designer- Trey Werr

Lead Sound Designer- Ian Strasma
